701187f-a.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Bedford Park Boulevard
701187f-a.text:
2950 Grand Concourse, at the N.E. corner of Bedford Park
Boulevard, showing the Drake School.
May S, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
701187f-a.folder: Grand Concourse & Bedford Park Boulevard, Bronx, NY

701189f-b.title: Bronx: Grand Concourse - Bedford Park Boulevard
701189f-b.text:
Grand Concurse, west side, between Bedford Park Boulevard and East 204th Street (at the head of East 202nd Street), showing the St. Philip Neri Roman Catholic Church.
May 8, 1928
P. L. Sperr
(s)
The same, from a different angle. To the right
of the church is the rectory.
May 8, 1928
P. L. Sperr
(3)
The rear of the church, on the east side of
Villa Avenue.
May 5, 1938
P. L. Sperr
